mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jumei2.jm_bt_product ( channel_id, deal_id, jumei_product_id, product_code, foreign_language_name, product_name_cn, product_long_name, product_medium_name, product_short_name, vo_category_name, category_lv1_name, category_lv2_name, category_lv3_name, category_lv4_name, category_lv4_id, brand_name, brand_id, product_type, size_type, color_en, attribute, origin, address_of_produce, material_en, material_cn, product_des_en, product_des_cn, available_period, applicable_crowd, search_meta_text_custom, special_note, function_ids, msrp, hs_code, hs_name, hs_unit, send_flg, synch_state, created, creater, modified, modifier, syn_flg ) VALUES( #{channelId}, #{dealId}, #{jumeiProductId}, #{productCode}, #{foreignLanguageName}, #{productNameCn}, #{productLongName}, #{productMediumName}, #{productShortName}, #{voCategoryName}, #{categoryLv1Name}, #{categoryLv2Name}, #{categoryLv3Name}, #{categoryLv4Name}, #{categoryLv4Id}, #{brandName}, #{brandId}, #{productType}, #{sizeType}, #{colorEn}, #{attribute}, #{origin}, #{addressOfProduce}, #{materialEn}, #{materialCn}, #{productDesEn}, #{productDesCn}, #{availablePeriod}, #{applicableCrowd}, #{searchMetaTextCustom}, #{specialNote}, #{functionIds}, #{msrp}, #{hsCode}, #{hsName}, #{hsUnit}, #{sendFlg}, #{synchState}, #{created}, #{creater}, #{modified}, #{modifier}, #{synFlg} )
